arm.name: arm
arm.transformationDescription:
Within a matter of moments, a layer of [npc.armFullDescription] has quickly grown over them, and, looking down, [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] [npc.her] new fur growing over the backs of [npc.her] hands as your fingers merge into four and sharp claws push out to replace [npc.her] fingernails. [npc.Her] palms rapidly transform to be [npc.materialDescriptor] padded and thin, and at [npc.her] upper-biceps, [npc.her] fur smoothly transitions into the [npc.skin] that's covering the rest of [npc.her] body. Suddenly [npc.she] [npc.verb(have)] the urge to touch and interact with everything within the area.
As the transformation comes to an end, [npc.nameIsFull] left with [style.boldSquirrel(skirren arms and hands)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription]. I'm a call them Grabby and umm Grabby two.
arm.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] [npc.armRows] arms, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription(true)]. [npc.Her] hands are formed into furry skirren hands, complete with sharp claws and padded digits. I'm a gunna scratch you.
